name: portal
description: Library to create portal like UIs

scripts.build: browserify --standalone Portal src/portal.js -o dist/portal.js; uglifyjs dist/portal.js --source-map dist/portal.min.map  --source-map-root portal.js --source-map-url portal.min.map -mc -o dist/portal.min.js
